data.title: STD & Telephone Area Codes Sri Lanka
data.meta_description: List of 29 area codes in Sri Lanka. STD Codes and telephone area dialing codes in Sri Lanka. Find out how to call different cities in Sri Lanka using area codes.
data.text:
Area Codes in Sri Lanka

Given below is the complete list of area codes in Sri Lanka. The table below shows all the 29 area codes in Sri Lanka. Sri Lanka area codes usually have 1 or 2 digits. While calling Sri Lanka from abroad, you need to dial the ISD code followed by the area code and finally the phone number.

â€‹ Find Area Code

Given below is a list of area codes for calling Sri Lanka's major cities/regions.

Click here to know How to call Sri Lanka from abroad
